newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 16.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 16.

text.p: These are the main headlines on Hungary's Kossuth Radio midday news. Reuters cannot vouch for their accuracy:
-- The draft lau on land will be discussed by the government soon, Agricultural Minister Frigyes Nagy told a conference.
-- The spring session of the Parliament is unlikely to end before the middle of July.
-- An entrepreneur, whose car has been blown up recently, died in hospital, probably of an infection of his wounds.
-- The police spotted on the black market a new type of drug, which had not been known before.
